            <div class="banner-message"><div class="message-wrapper" id="banner_general_message_1">
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12">
            <h2 class="message-header A-TYP22L-RW-ALL">Beware of Phishing SMS</h2>
            <button class="close-message-button" data-message-id="29c471c83c">
                <span class="icon icon-delete" aria-hidden="true"></span>
                <span class="visuallyhidden"></span>
            </button>
        </div>
        <div class="sm-12 lg-8">
            <div class="message-text A-TYP16R-RW-ALL"><p>HSBC will never ask customers to contact third-party insurance companies via SMS links or phone numbers. All our one-way SMS bears IDs starting with '#' only. Stay vigilant! <a href="/help/cybersecurity-and-fraud/phishing/">Learn more</a>.</p>
</div>

<h2 class="A-TYP22R-RW-ALL title text-container text ">

</h2>


    <ul class="list advanced-list">
    
    
    
    




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <li class="element M-SMARTSPCGENELEMENT-DEV"><div class="list-item" id="content_main_advancedListElement_1">

<h3 class="A-TYP16BL-RW-ALL text-container text ">
    
    
        
        Easy access to major currencies
    
</h3>


    
        
    
    
    














<div class="A-PAR14R-RW-ALL description text-container text ">
    
    
        
        Your purchases and cash withdrawals in 12 major currencies can be debited directly from the corresponding foreign currency deposits in your HSBC integrated account. These currencies include HKD, USD, GBP, JPY, RMB, EUR, THB, AUD, NZD, SGD, CAD and CHF. Any purchases outside of these currencies will be settled in HKD according to the prevailing exchange rate.
    
</div>


    
</div>
</li>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <li class="element M-SMARTSPCGENELEMENT-DEV"><div class="list-item" id="content_main_advancedListElement_2">

    <ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Open a supplementary card for your loved ones / children aged 12 or above in a few easy steps on the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Supplementary cardholders don't need to visit a branch or hold a bank account</li> 
 <li>Provide for the spending needs of your loved ones in any currencies, hassle-free. Simply maintain HKD or respective foreign currency funds in your Integrated Account and your supplementary cardholders can use them directly, with no foreign currency transaction fees</li> 
 <li>Worried about over-spending? You can control how much supplementary cardholders spend by setting spending rules via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app</li> 
 <li>Keep updated on supplementary card spending with real-time spend and withdrawal notifications</li> 
 <li>Earn 0.4% cash rebates every time your loved ones spend on their supplementary cards</li> 
 <li>There are no annual fees, no foreign currency transaction fees, and no ATM cash withdrawal fees when using HSBC Group’s ATMs worldwide</li> 
 <li>Apply for up to six supplementary debit cards per principal debit card, if you have a big family</li> 
</ul>

<div id="content_main_columnControl_18">

        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_31" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_25" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What limits can I set for HSBC Mastercard® Supplementary Debit Card?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">As a principal cardholder, you can set the following limits:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Monthly spend limit (covers purchases made via Mastercard® and EPS network)</li> 
 <li>Daily local ATM cash withdrawal limit</li> 
 <li>Daily overseas ATM cash withdrawal limit</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Will my supplementary cardholder know my account balance?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Your privacy matters a lot to us. Supplementary cardholders have access to a limited set of banking / ATM services, and balance enquiries are blocked for them.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What do I do when I receive the supplementary card?</strong><br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can follow three simple steps to get started: </p> 
<ol class="A-LSTO-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Once you receive the HSBC Mastercard® Supplementary Debit Card, pass it to your supplementary debit cardholder</li> 
 <li>Advise your supplementary cardholder to activate the card and set the PIN by calling 3163 0633. A one-time password will be sent to him/her for verification. You will be notified by email and SMS once the activation is successful</li> 
 <li>After card activation, you can change the spend and withdrawal limits of the card conveniently via the HSBC HK Mobile Banking app. Just log on > tap on any accounts linked to the card > 'Manage debit cards'. Remember to tell your supplementary cardholder about the limits you set (but just in case you forget, we will also notify the supplementary cardholder every time you change the limit)</li> 
</ol>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

        <div class="dropdown" aria-controls="-1002644857__panel0" role="button" tabindex="0" aria-expanded="false">
            <h3 id="-1002644857__tab0" class="dropdown-text">What should I know if I am a supplementary cardholder? </h3>
            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1002644857__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">
            <div class="exp-panel">




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="cc-wrapper O-COLCTRL-RW-DEV" role="region">
    

<div id="content_main_columnControl_19">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_32" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_26" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="D/M/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="Hongkong">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Getting Started</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>If you hold an HSBC Mastercard® Supplementary Debit Card, you can activate the card and set up the PIN by calling 3163 0633. A one-time password will be sent to your mobile number for verification</li> 
 <li>You can then start enjoying the benefits of the fee-free multi-currency spending experience! Remind your principal cardholder to keep sufficient funds in his/her account, just in case</li> 
 <li>For your convenience, you can also add the card to your mobile wallet!</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Using the card</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>You can use the card at any merchants worldwide that accept Mastercard® for purchases or via local EPS network. Please ask your principal cardholder about the limits he/she set for the card before using it</li> 
 <li>You can withdraw cash from HSBC Group’s ATM network for free. If you withdraw from non-HSBC Group ATMs, fees may apply. Refer to our tariffs for details. Again, please check what withdrawal limits have been set by the principal cardholder</li> 
 <li>Remember – each time you spend or withdraw with the card, we will notify you and the principal cardholder. You will also be notified every time the spending / withdrawal limit set by the principal cardholder is changed. You can find out the remaining monthly spending limit from the spend notification we send you after every transaction</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Just in case…</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Needing some card services? In most cases, you'll have to ask your principal cardholder. These services include: </p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Check card information / status</li> 
 <li>Check transaction history</li> 
 <li>Replace card</li> 
 <li>Change card limits</li> 
 <li>Request a new PIN (except first PIN set-up)</li> 
 <li>Dispute a transaction</li> 
 <li>Change of personal particulars e.g. phone number and email address</li> 
 <li>Cancel card</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">However, you will still be able to raise requests related to the security of your card. They are:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Activate your card</li> 
 <li>Block your card</li> 
 <li>Report lost card (you need to ask your principal cardholder for a replacement card request)</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>

    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Remarks:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="background-color: transparent;"><a id="1"></a>1. You can choose the HSBC Mastercard® Debit Card and/or the HSBC UnionPay ATM Card upon opening your new integrated account.</span></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><span style="background-color: transparent;"><a id="2"></a>2. You need to have an integrated account to apply.</span></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Apple, the Apple logo, iPhone, iPad, iPod touch, Touch ID and Face ID are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the US and other countries. App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc.</li> 
 <li>Google Play and the Google Play logo are trademarks of Google LLC. Android is a trademark of Google LLC.</li> 
 <li>QR Code is a registered trademark of Denso Wave Incorporated.</li> 
 <li>The screen displays are for reference and illustration purposes only.</li> 
 <li>Terms and Conditions apply.</li> 
</ul> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong><a id="3"></a>3. By activating this card, you agree to the Debit Card Terms and Conditions and accept the preset daily spending limit as printed on the card mailer. Once the card is activated, if you'd prefer to lower your spending limit, you can adjust it anytime from the 'Manage debit cards' screen on your HSBC HK app or call our hotline as printed on the back of your card.</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Risk Disclosure:</strong></p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Currency conversion risk - The value of your foreign currency and RMB deposit will be subject to the risk of exchange rate fluctuation. If you choose to convert your foreign currency and RMB deposit to other currencies at an exchange rate that is less favourable than the exchange rate in which you made your original conversion to that foreign currency and RMB, you may suffer loss in principal.</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>
